title: pErAnandam
sahitya:
pErAnandam kAN hari bhajanam


anupallavi

  ArAvamudanai bhajittAl Adi vyAdigaL tIrum pArinil


caraNam 1    nAradar mudal munivOrum sanakAdiyarum ennEramum tudikkum
  caraNam 2    aSta siddhiyum kai kUDum sakala iSTa siddhi tarum divya nAmamE
  caraNam 3    vAsavan ayanum bhajikkum rAmadAsan manam inikkum vAzhvil magizhvaLikkum
